import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function Cards() { useEffect(()=>{ fetch("./hotelDetails/restaurants.json") .then((details) => details.json()) .then((data) => setState(data) ); },[]) const[state,setState] = useState('') return (
{state && Array.isArray(state) && state.map((element, index) => (
{element.name} Opened on Thanksgiving Day 1990. Chef / Owner Ron Silver began baking pies and selling them to restaurants and his neighbors out of a small kitchen at the corner of Hudson and North Moore St. in Tribeca. Today, NYCâ€™s beloved restaurant and pie shop celebrates 27 years of classic, made from scratch American cooking.
))}
) } export default Cards
